Entry.Name: Insecure Connection
Entry.Description: The presence of URLs within your application that are not secured with SSL poses a significant security risk, as it allows for the interception and modification of data transmitted through these URLs by malicious actors.

Mitigation.Textual:
Please meticulously review each URL and apply SSL wherever feasible. Ensure that all data transmitted via HTTP, including session cookies, is not security-sensitive.
For further information on using Android with HTTPS and SSL please refer to the official guide.
For further information on managing sessions and cookies, please refer to this guide.
